summary: 该接口用于查询集合的详细信息。

RequestId.title: Id of the request
RequestId.description: 请求ID。用于定位日志，排查问题。

Success.description:
调用是否成功。取值如下：

true：调用成功。

false：调用失败。

responseDemo:
[{"type":"json","example":"{
  "RequestId": "0000-ABCD-E****",
  "Collection": {
    "QualifiedName": "album.12334",
    "CollectionType": "album",
    "Name": "collectionName",
    "Comment": "comment",
    "OwnerId": "1234444",
    "OwnerName": "owner",
    "CreateTime": 1668600147617,
    "UpdateTime": 1668600148617,
    "Level": 1
  },
  "Success": true,
  "ErrorCode": "9999",
  "ErrorMessage": "album.xxxx does not exist.",
  "HttpStatusCode": 200
}","errorExample":""},{"type":"xml","example":"<GetMetaCollectionDetailResponse>
    <RequestId>0000-ABCD-E****</RequestId>
    <Collection>
        <QualifiedName>album.12334</QualifiedName>
        <CollectionType>album</CollectionType>
        <Name>collectionName</Name>
        <Comment>comment</Comment>
        <OwnerId>1234444</OwnerId>
        <OwnerName>owner</OwnerName>
        <CreateTime>1668600147617</CreateTime>
        <UpdateTime>1668600148617</UpdateTime>
        <Level>1</Level>
    </Collection>
    <Success>true</Success>
    <ErrorCode>9999</ErrorCode>
    <ErrorMessage>album.xxxx does not exist.</ErrorMessage>
</GetMetaCollectionDetailResponse>","errorExample":""}]
title: 查询集合详情信息
